A Tax Increment Financing project plan application initiated by a developer and submitted to the Community Development Director. This begins the process at the City of Independence. A redevelopment agreement is entered into to carry out the plan if approved.  A detailed process is shown in the attached document. If you have any questions, I will be glad to clarify.

answers.text:
Although we are just getting into forming TIF districts (called Tax Allocation Districts, or TADs, in Georgia) I have found an excellent resource is at www.cdfa.net, or the the Council for Development Finance Agencies. They have a wealth of information on all aspects of TIF, including many implementation documents and research on best practices.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Goodyear, AZ would like to know how other cities handle development agreements.  

Are they initiated through only one department?  
If so, which one?  
Who is involved in creating the agreement?  
Does the City Manager approve all of them?  
Do they go before your Council?  
How are they tracked?  

Thank you!
Elaine Schmerbeck, MPA
Executive Management Assistant, City Manager's Office
City of Goodyear -- All-America City
(623) 882-7057
elaine.schmerbeck@goodyearaz.gov
title: Development Agreements
